definition: to bestow (a reward)/to give (to an inferior)/to hand down/a reward (bestowed by a superior)/to appreciate (beauty)

sentences.english: The failure to appreciate the iPhone was all mine.
sentences.chinese: 這個放棄欣賞iphone的行爲全是我自己的想法。

sentences.english: She spent hours admiring herself in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 她用了幾個小時對着鏡子自我欣賞。

sentences.english: You have no feeling for the beauty of nature.
sentences.chinese: 大自然的美缺乏欣賞力。

sentences.english: It attracted many thousands of visitors from all levels of society.
sentences.chinese: 水晶宮曾吸收了社會各階級的瞻仰者駐足欣賞。

sentences.english: I hope the people at the nursing home appreciate you.
sentences.chinese: 我希望敬老院的人會很欣賞你。

sentences.english: "Non-instructive" teaching can firstly be used in literature teaching.
sentences.chinese: “非指示性”教育首先用於文學作品的閱讀欣賞教學。

sentences.english: Please enjoy the Latin dance "Joyful Cowboy".
sentences.chinese: 請欣賞拉丁舞《快樂牛仔》。

sentences.english: It can promote teacher's specialized knowledge through the development of music appreciation class.
sentences.chinese: 通過開發音樂欣賞課程促進了教師的專業成長。

sentences.english: So, we may enjoy wonderful performances from all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 那我們就能欣賞到來自世界各地的精彩演出了。

sentences.english: Can also enjoy to imitate Tang's music and song and dances in Xian, taste article Tang's vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 在西安還可以欣賞到仿唐音樂和歌舞，嘗品唐菜。

sentences.english: There was a large appreciative audience in the theatre .
sentences.chinese: 劇院裏坐滿了有欣賞力的聽衆。

sentences.english: Now let's enjoy the tape of a fiwimous popular singer Miss Tianzhen.
sentences.chinese: 目下當今欣賞一下在大歌星田震的磁帶。

sentences.english: I appreciate the 'results driven' culture in Sensata.
sentences.chinese: 我非常欣賞森薩塔‘注重成果’的企業文化。

sentences.english: Understands the appreciation, you also then have the enchanting graceful bearing.
sentences.chinese: 懂得欣賞，你也便擁有迷人的風姿。

sentences.english: Lisson to the music and sing the song.
sentences.chinese: 幼兒欣賞歌曲光盤，跟唱歌曲。

definition: to look at sth with pleasure/to watch (sth marvelous)/ornamental
to like/to love/to be fond of/favorite
to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
to have a taste of/to realize/to appreciate
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
